collection-where-radio.required: Tell us where you were asked to collect your BRP from

reason-radio.required: Select a reason why you couldn't collect your BRP

email.email: Enter your email in the correct format for example, name@domain.com

address-street.required: Enter your house name or number and street

contact-address-street.required: Enter your house name or number and street

date-of-birth.future: The date is in the future
date-of-birth.format: Enter your date of birth in the correct format

collection-date.future: The date is in the future
collection-date.format: Enter the collection date in the correct format

nominated-date.required: Enter the nominees date of birth
nominated-date.future: The date is in the future
nominated-date.format: Enter the nominees date of birth in the correct format

nominated-fullname.required: Tell us the nominees full name

nominated-id-number.required: Tell us the nominees identity document number

org-help.required: Tell us if you had help to complete this form

rep-name.required: Tell us the name of the person that helped you to complete this form

org-type.required: Tell us the type of the organisation that helped you to complete this form
